Uses of Interface
org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcOperations

  • Packages that use JdbcOperations 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.jdbc.core
    Provides the core JDBC framework, based on JdbcTemplate and its associated callback interfaces and helper objects.
    org.springframework.jdbc.core.namedparam
    JdbcTemplate variant with named parameter support.

    • Uses of JdbcOperations in org.springframework.jdbc.core

      Classes in org.springframework.jdbc.core that implement JdbcOperations 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JdbcTemplate
      This is the central class in the JDBC core package. It simplifies the use of JDBC and helps to avoid common errors.
      Methods in org.springframework.jdbc.core with parameters of type JdbcOperations 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int[] BatchUpdateUtils.executeBatchUpdate(java.lang.String sql, java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> batchArgs, int[] columnTypes, JdbcOperations jdbcOperations)
      Deprecated. 
       

    • Uses of JdbcOperations in org.springframework.jdbc.core.namedparam

      Methods in org.springframework.jdbc.core.namedparam that return JdbcOperations 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JdbcOperations NamedParameterJdbcOperations.getJdbcOperations()
      Expose the classic Spring JdbcTemplate to allow invocation of classic JDBC operations.
      JdbcOperations NamedParameterJdbcTemplate.getJdbcOperations()
      Expose the classic Spring JdbcTemplate operations to allow invocation of less commonly used methods.
      Methods in org.springframework.jdbc.core.namedparam with parameters of type JdbcOperations 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int[] NamedParameterBatchUpdateUtils.executeBatchUpdateWithNamedParameters(ParsedSql parsedSql, SqlParameterSource[] batchArgs, JdbcOperations jdbcOperations)
      Deprecated. 
       
      Constructors in org.springframework.jdbc.core.namedparam with parameters of type JdbcOperations 
      Constructor and Description
      NamedParameterJdbcTemplate(JdbcOperations classicJdbcTemplate)
      Create a new NamedParameterJdbcTemplate for the given classic Spring JdbcTemplate.
